findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The contract allows minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens.

findings.title: Centralization Risk
findings.description: Active contract ownership identified which can lead to centralization of power and risks such as rug pull scams.

findings.title: Unprotected function calls
findings.description: The functions toggleSwap(bool) and excludeMultipleAccountsFromFees(address[],bool) are called without proper protection.

findings.title: Unsecured contract ownership transfer
findings.description: The smart contract has an active ownership which can lead to centralization risks such as rug pull scams.

findings.title: Unrestricted token supply modification
findings.description: The smart contract authorizes dev wallet to modify some of the 'write contract' parameters, including total token supply.

findings.title: Unprotected fee collection mechanism
findings.description: The smart contract has an active ownership which allows the owner to add or remove wallets from fees, swap checks, and transaction limits without proper protection.

findings.title: Unrestricted swap status modification
findings.description: Smart contract owner can change swap status.
